subject: Soccer
Algarve Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s soccer team lost consecutive games for the first time in 13 years and conceded five goals in a match for the first time in the team’s 29-year history.
snippet: The United States women’s soccer team lost consecutive games for the first time in 13 years and conceded five goals in a match for the first time in the team’s 29-year history.
